newsitem.title: USA: Yellow to separate fuel surcharge from base.
newsitem.headline: Yellow to separate fuel surcharge from base.

text.p: Yellow Freight System Inc, a unit of Yellow Corp, said on Tuesday it expects to separate its fuel surcharge from its base-rate increase in January, due to fuel price uncertainty.

"If fuel costs are not embedded in Yellow's rate scale, they can be removed more easily when they decline," said president Bill Zollars in a statement. "Conversely, Yellow is not penalized when fuel costs increase."
Yellow Freight noted that diesel fuel prices have risen for the 11th week in a row.
